about_the_game:
Rusts Of Corruption is a game about life, death, purpose, and meaning. It is unique Point & Click Adventure game with a heavy focus on storytelling and character interactions. Speak to each robot, learn their stories. What influence will you have on them?




Rusts Of Corruption takes place on a small island on an exoplanet named Charon. Unsure of exactly how you got there, the game simply allows you to explore the island, speak to the robots inhabiting it, and learn about the troubled history of the exoplanet.
Throughout the game, you will be given the opportunity to explore the island in which the game takes place on, and you will be able to speak to characters in interactive dialog trees.
As you progress through the world, it slowly becomes corrupted by some kind of eldritch entity, forcing you to explore within a limited amount of time before the island ‘dies’.




Each robot has their own backstory, personality traits, and quirks. Some are blissfully ignorant, others are painfully aware of their coming doom, and others ponder on the meaning of life.




I believe in making games that as many people as possible to enjoy, and for this reason the game will include a large amount of accessibility options so you are as comfortable playing the game as possible.
  • Contrast adjustments (gamma)
  • Reduce or remove background particles
  • Change the game font to make it easier to read
  • Change the colour of the text to make it easier to read
  • Enable or disable text animations
  • Turn off screen shake and glitch effects
All Of This and More to Come!!!




You can play the Demo RIGHT NOW!!! This is the original version of the game built for the Pirate Software Game Jam, and gives a rough idea of what the finished game will look like.




Are you interested in the game? Do you want updates on the development? Join the Official Discord Server and become a part of our growing community! The link is in the sidebar!

CONTENT WARNINGS

Rusts of Corruption contains themes surrounding depression and suicide, including a scene where a suicide is depicted. This scene can be turned off in the games settings if desired.

content_descriptors.notes: Rusts of Corruption contains a particular scene depicting Suicide, which may be upsetting to some individuals. This scene can be disabled in the settings at any time.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS High Sierra or above
  • Processor: Apple Silicon chip recommended, but the game should work on 64-bit Intel Processors to some degree.
  • Additional Notes: Modern personal computers should be able to run the game with little to no problem. Graphics settings are available in-game to allow better performance on older devices as needed.

short_description: You've mysteriously awoken on an isolated island on an unknown world. A corrupting force spreads through the island, leaving only a short amount of time to learn about the islands mysteries... Who will you meet? What will you learn? Are you ready to see the world die?
